WRITING.TEXT: Or you do this because you're in the military and it's forced upon you

I tried too hard to be friends with everybody. Always wanted to hang with all these "friends" and what not, but I never realized that I was always the one making the plans. Never had many ask me to come, I was always the one asking.
As soon as high school was over and the grad parties finished, I found out who the few true friends I actually had were. Went from tons of friends to a small group, and I regret wasting my time on those that didn't care like I did. It haunts me sometimes when I think about the time wasted.
